attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this petition is to save Robert Fidlers home from being knocked down,
every person in this world has a right to somewhere to live and to defend their castle from being a pile of rubble after so much heart and love has been put into the creation. we the people who sign this can make a diffrence for someones pride and joy being taken away from them......

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual cases.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
